text: Patrocles name may refer to: *Patrocles of Thurii (5th century BC), tragic poet *Patrocles teacher of rhetoric mentioned by Quintilian *Patrocles (geographer) (c. 312-261 BC), Macedonian general and writer under Seleucus and Antiochus *Noël Patrocles de Thoisy (died 1671), early governor general of the French Antilles ==See also== *Patroclus (disambiguation)
title: Patrocles
